learning_objective: Develop programs with sequences and simple loops, to express ideas or address a problem.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is preparing a robot for its leap year routine, which needs to happen every 4 years. He is writing the logic that outputs 'Leap year routine' every 4 years for a 20 year span. What would the output be if the current year is 2019, based on the code snippet below?",
    "Answer1": "Outputs 'Leap year routine' 5 times",
    "Answer2": "Outputs 'Leap year routine' every year for 20 years",
    "Answer3": "Outputs 'Leap year routine' 6 times",
    "Answer4": "Outputs 'Leap year routine' 4 times",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "As per the code, 'Leap year routine' will be executed every 4 years, starting from 2019 till 2039 (20 years in total). This will happen in the years 2023, 2027, 2031, 2035, 2039 - a total of 5 times.",
    "code_snippet": "integer startYear = 2019\ninteger endYear = startYear + 20\nwhile startYear <= endYear\n    if (startYear Mod 4 ) == 0 \n       output('Leap year routine')\n    end\n    startYear = startYear + 1\nend"
}
